choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc limit #{startIndex}, #{size}
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (title like '%${keyword}%' or content like '%${keyword}%') order by group_no desc, order_no asc limit #{startIndex}, #{size}
select count(*) from board where (title like '%${_parameter}%' or content like '%${_parameter}%')

choose.when: insert into board values( null, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now(), ( select ifnull( max( group_no ), 0)+1 from board a), 1, 0, #{userNo} )

mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.content, a.group_no as groupNo, a.order_no as orderNo, a.depth, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName from board a, user b where a.no = #{no} and a.user_no = b.no
select no, title, content from board where no=#{no} and user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=#{no} and user_no=#{userNo}
